findings.title: Send Instead Of Transfer
findings.description: Using 'send' instead of 'transfer' can lead to reentrancy vulnerabilities.

findings.title: (Unsafe) Use Of Untrusted Libraries
findings.description: The finding indicates the use of untrusted libraries within a smart contract, posing potential security risks.

findings.title: Semantic Consistency Checks
findings.description: Manually checking the logic of implemented smart contracts and comparing with the description in the white paper.

findings.title: Advanced DeFi Scrutiny
findings.description: Review business logics, examine system operations, and place DeFi-related aspects under scrutiny to uncover possible pitfalls and/or bugs.

findings.title: Trust Issue of Admin Keys
findings.description: In `Friend3`, there is a privileged administrative account, i.e., `owner`. The administrative account plays a critical role in governing and regulating the protocol-wide operations.

findings.title: Avoiding Use of Variadic Byte Array
Making Type Inference Explicit
findings.description: The finding suggests making type inference explicit to avoid potential issues related to implicit type conversions.

findings.title: Strengthened Group Index Validation in Friend3V2
findings.description: The `isValidIndex` function only validates if a given group index is no larger than `_globalGroupIndex`, but does not check if it's a non-zero number.

findings.title: Improved Parameter Validation Upon Their Changes
findings.description: DeFi protocols typically have a number of system- wide parameters that can be dynamically configured on demand.

findings.title: Trust Issue of Admin Keys
findings.description: In `Friend3`, there is a privileged administrative account, i.e., `owner`. The administrative account plays a critical role in governing and regulating the protocol-wide operations.

findings.title: Time and State
findings.description: Weaknesses in this category are related to the improper management of time and state in an environment that supports simultaneous or near-simultaneous computation by multiple systems, processes, or threads.

findings.title: Error Conditions, Return Values, Status Codes
findings.description: Weaknesses in this category include weaknesses that occur if a function does not generate the correct return/status code, or if the application does not handle all possible return/status codes that could be generated by a function.

findings.title: Resource Management
findings.description: Weaknesses in this category are related to improper management of system resources.

findings.title: Behavioral Issues
findings.description: Weaknesses in this category are related to unexpected behaviors from code that an application uses.

findings.title: Business Logics
findings.description: Review business logics, examine system operations, and place DeFi-related aspects under scrutiny to uncover possible pitfalls and/or bugs.

findings.title: Arguments and Parameters
findings.description: The update logic on system-wide parameters can be improved by applying more rigorous sanity checks to ensure they fall in an appropriate range.

findings.title: Expression Issues
findings.description: Weaknesses in this category are related to incorrectly written expressions within code.
